text.text_translated: Many things that the speaker said felt true. I really think there is a risk that the more connected we are, the more alone we feel. This is not such a big problem for my generation, because we lived without technology for a long time. We know how to be alone, and we also know that it is okay to be alone. But people who are under 20 are very different. They are so busy communicating through messages that they never experience being alone, and they might not learn how to enjoy their own company. Also, they learn to have conversations through messages which they can change, so they do not learn the skill of real conversation with a person in front of them.
